node.display_long_description:
Audio Trip is a VR dance game where you catch gems, ride ribbons, smash drums, and dodge barriers as you dance your way through surreal environments specially crafted for each song.

Make it your Audio Trip by using the in-VR level editor to create custom choreographies with your own unique dance moves, with the same tool used by the developers to create their choreography! Join in on our Choreography Contest to showcase your flair! [Discord http://audio.chat]

Main Features
• Licensed music by top artists: Skrillex, Zedd, deadmau5, Lady Gaga, Tiësto... and more coming soon!
• In-VR level editor (“Choreographer” tool) included.
• ‘Full’ or ‘Short Trip’ options for each song.
• Fully immersive hand-crafted environments for each song.
• Intuitive UI with a simple tutorial for your first time playing.
• Gameplay customization: ‘Comfort’, ‘Dancer’, ‘No Fail’, ‘Color Swap’.
• Global and Local (Party Mode) Leaderboards to challenge your friends!
• Many more features and content coming soon!

nodes.title: 18 NEW CARDIO LEVELS - OUT NOW!
nodes.body_text:
CARDIO LEVELS now available on all 18 songs

Introducing our new Cardio Levels! Based on the amazing feedback from our beta tester community, we're happy to announce that our experimental Cardio levels were such a hit, that we've now created one for every song in the game! Thank you to all of our fitness-focused Trippers for giving us such great feedback to help make this possible.

So, WHAT IS A CARDIO LEVEL?? These levels are a bit different than the others... They focus on giving you a Cardio(vascular) workout -- They include BIG, full-range, repetitious movements to get your heart pumping! So now you can workout to a star-studded tracklist including artists such as Lady Gaga, Skrillex, Zedd, and more! And of course, you can follow our lead on these new choreographies and copy these moves into your own songs with our in-VR editor to create your own workouts.

But first, a few words of CAUTION for these new levels...
- Make sure you warm up first, as these levels require full-range full body movement. Remember to squat and lean with your knees, and move your feet if you need to reach!
- These moves require a bigger playspace than our other levels, so check your surroundings and proceed with caution.
- These levels are not recommended for Beginners - They are designed to be around a Regular level difficulty.

Also... some Cardio levels are inherently more strenuous than others. 
Here's a tip: Dance Monkey and Golden Pineapple are easier Cardio levels, and Jurassic Snack Pack and Red are... let's just say you'll need endurance.

So... Got some dusty fitness-related New Year resolutions on the shelf? It's time to smash through them.

Have fun, stay hydrated, and keep dancing,
♥️ Kinemotik

nodes.title: GET FUNKY with THREE new songs in our BIGGEST content update yet
nodes.body_text:
GET DOWN, GET FUNKY
Is it us or is it getting funky in here? This mega new free update contains 9 new choreographies in 3 funk filled songs, with all new trippy environments to dance through!

Look for these new songs in your playlist:
In need of a warm up session before breaking a sweat? Check out Freedom” by The Originals - try it out for a great way to warm up and get into the zone.

Wanna get reaaal dancey? Hop straight into Can't Take It, Pt. 2 by Hot Rod Elegants or Keep My Cool by Benj Heard and show us your best funky dance moves!

Now, go on, get down with your bad self!
♥️ Kinemotik

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription:
I compared it with synth riders a few months ago, I got synth riders finally and I loved it very much.
Today I got audio trip, at first I was thinking it is so much alike than synth riders and synth riders seems more fun to me.
However after play several rounds of Cardio Mode, I took back what I thought.
This is more like a Cardio game than rhythm game. You have to move so much and your heartbeat will pump so high. I will play it as my daily workout. 
Now I love synth riders and audio trip both!
node.reviewTitle: If you want fun workout, just get it!

website_page_meta.description: Audio Trip is a VR dance game. Players move their bodies to catch colored gems, ride ribbons, smash drums, and dodge barriers -- which together form exhilarating dance choreographed by a professional dancer.
website_page_meta.title: Audio Trip · Oculus Quest
